titles: The papist represented, and not misrepresented being in answer to the first sheet of the second part of the Papist misrepresented and represented : and for a further vindication of the catechism truly representing the doctrine and practices of the Church of Rome.
author: Williams, John, 1636?-1709.
notes: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
Attributed to John Williams. cf. BM.
keywords: Gother, John, d. 1704. --  Papist misrepresented and represented.
